1370: Lubertus moved to Die Camp.A.9 after marriage.
Got married to Trame at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Trame, Trame, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Trame, Anselmi, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Trame, Badeloghen, at age 24.
Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 1 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Trame, Margareta, at age 26.
1379: Had a daughter with Trame, Sarre, at age 29.
1381: Lost daughter Trame when Trame was 12 years old.
1386: Had a daughter with Trame, Ryccie, at age 36.
1391: Had a son with Trame, Radewijns, at age 41.
1392: Had a daughter with Trame, Marisseis, at age 42.
